name: Awesome Dalat Farm Tour
description: Dalat is a mountainous city located at Central Highland of Vietnam well-known for cool weather, gorgeous landscape. We have beautiful French colonial villas surrounded by a rural setting: farms growing exotic vegetables and flowers. We are also known for pine tree forest, tea and coffee plantations. The community that I grew up is a mix of locals and immigrants who mostly participate in tourism and agriculture. If you love the peaceful atmosphere of the nature and prefer the learning trip, this tour is designed just for you.
